attr.title: MiniDoom
attr.desc: MiniDOOM is very short tribute game based on Doom 1. It transforms the classic FPS into a 2D action platformer.  Collect keys and battle your way through 5 stages with the classic Doom weapons, powerups and enemies.
attr.inst: Get the game on https://gamejolt.com/games/mini-doom/206421, place Mini Doom V1.3.exe in the ports/minidoom/gamedata/ directory.
attr.inst_md: Get the game on the [MiniDoom page](https://gamejolt.com/games/mini-doom/206421), place Mini Doom V1.3.exe in the ports/minidoom/gamedata/ directory.
